## This is going to make a plot

```{r}
plot_df = tibble(
  x= rnorm(n = 100),
  y = 1 + 2 * x + rnorm(n=100)
)
ggplot(plot_df, aes(x = x)) + geom_histogram()
```

```{r learning_assessment_chunk}
df1 = tibble(
  x = rnorm(n = 500, mean = 1),

)
```
